title: Infrastructure & peripheral assets
content:
Infrastructure & peripheral assets include, but aren't limited to items such as projectors, power supplies, fire protection systems, air-conditioning systems, RFID systems, and so on. You can expand the available subtypes to be managed. For example, a parking system.
